metadata.name: The Infinite Weight
metadata.description:
This first piece of the Plastic Breeze collection represents the infinite weight that plastic imposes upon our lives. Nothing dissapears, the damage is already done.

The totality of the funds collected through this collection will be donated to the Ecomar Foundation.

https://fundacionecomar.org/en/plastic-breeze-arte-para-cuidar-los-mares-y-oceanos/
